## Properties
Name | Type | Description | Notes
------------ | ------------- | ------------- | -------------
**apply_to_new_sub_accounts** | **str** | If value is ‘TRUE’, all newly onboarded sub accounts are automatically added to the notification policy&#x27;s sub account list. | [optional]
